item.title: Resources for the Agile Yorkshire Group
item.description: We presented a "DevOps 101" talk at Agile Yorkshire last week. One of the slides listed resources for learning more about DevOps and I promised to create a page on our site listing them in detail. Here it is....Podcasts Devops Cafe - http://devopscafe.org/ - Original DevOps podcast, still current and relevant, older shows include discussions with all the names that matter in DevOps Foodfight Show - http://foodfightshow.org/ chef focused discussion on devops Arrested DevOps - http://www.
